text.section:
In addition to the child, the following shall be the parties in an action for involuntary termination of parental rights:
The petitioner;
The cabinet, if not the petitioner; and
The biological parents, if known and if their rights have not been previously terminated. It shall not be necessary to make the putative father a party if he is exempted by KRS 625.065.
Any party other than the child who is not the petitioner shall be a respondent.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 57, sec. 13, effective March 17, 1998. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 71, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 102, effective July 1, 1987.
